summary: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.
cast: Richard Derr|Barbara Rush|Peter Hansen|John Hoyt|Larry Keating|Rachel Ames|Stephen Chase|Frank Cady|Hayden Rorke|Sandro Giglio|Kirk Alyn|Gertrude Astor|Nina Borget|Steve Carruthers|Robert Chapman|Gene Collins|James Congdon|Marcel De la Brosse|Estelle Etterre|Sam Finn|Paul Frees|Kay Garrett|Slim Gaut|Art Gilmore|Robert Haines|Stuart Hall|Charmienne Harker|Sam Harris|Ramsay Hill|George Holmes|Stuart Holmes|Michael Jeffers|Walter Kelley|Hassan Khayam|Rudy Lee|Freeman Lusk|Chad Madison|Wayne Mallory|Dolores Mann|Mathew McCue|Frank McLure|William Meader|Joseph Mell|Harold Miller|Hans Moebus|Charles Morton|Leonard Mudie|Mary Murphy|Forbes Murray|Richard Neill|Gay Nelson|Manuel París|Paul Power|Waclaw Rekwart|Keith Richards|John Ridgely|Kasey Rogers|Victor Romito|John Roy|Edith Russell|Frances Sandford|Jeffrey Sayre|James Seay|Edna Smith|Queenie Smith|Harry Stanton|Paul Stathes|Bert Stevens|Robert Sully|Hal Taggart|Richard Vath|Stuart Whitman|Chalky Williams
title: Cuando los mundos chocan
